metadata.description: collection of skills for Sikt developers

plugins.name: aws-cli-access
plugins.description: Help accessing Sikt's AWS accounts via CLI, configuring AWS SSO sessions, and managing AWS CLI profiles

plugins.name: aws-core-principles
plugins.description: Guidance on Sikt's core principles for running services on AWS, including security and infrastructure as code

plugins.name: dns-configuration
plugins.description: Help with DNS configuration for Platon applications and Sikt-owned domains

plugins.name: email-sending
plugins.description: Help sending email from applications in Platon infrastructure

plugins.name: gitlab-ci-basics
plugins.description: Help with GitLab CI/CD pipeline configuration for Platon PaaS

plugins.name: kubectl-basics
plugins.description: Help with kubectl commands for Platon PaaS

plugins.name: loki-logging
plugins.description: Help with Loki logging in Platon, including LogQL queries and Grafana access

plugins.name: postgresql-aws
plugins.description: Help with PostgreSQL databases on AWS RDS in Platon

plugins.name: vault-basics
plugins.description: Help with Vault for secret management in Platon

plugins.name: vault-gitlab
plugins.description: Help integrating Vault secrets into GitLab CI/CD pipelines for Platon PaaS
